createBlock

public Block createBlock(EnumBlocks blockType,
                         float x,
                         float y,
                         float w,
                         float h,
                         java.util.Map<EnumBlockParams,java.lang.Object> params)
Creates a new block of the specified type. The specified parameters are copied into the new block

Parameters:
blockType -
x - Horizontal position of the block
y - Vertical position of the block
w - Width of the block
h - Height of the block
params - Parameters to be copied into the block
Returns:
A new Block

                         Vector2D offset,
                         Vector2D size,
                         java.util.Map<EnumBlockParams,java.lang.Object> params)
Creates a new block of the specified type. The specified parameters are copied into the new block

Parameters:
blockType -
offset - Vector2D with the position of the block
size - Vector2D with the size of the block
params - Parameters to be copied into the block
Returns:
A new Block

createBoundingBlock

public Block createBoundingBlock(float x,
                                 float y,
                                 float w,
                                 float h,
                                 EnumDirections direction)
Creates one of the blocks used as walls in the simulation

Parameters:
x - Horizontal position of the block
y - Vertical position of the block
w - Width of the block
h - Height of the block
direction - of application of the force
Returns:
BoundingBlock used as element of the wall
